name: Rise of Mafia: Boss Returns
description:
Rise of Mafia (RoM) is a brand new 2022 Mafia-themed real-time strategy game, complete with diverse simulation gameplay: Recruit your associates, Manage your turf, Invade your rivals, Protect your territory. On top of that, develop intimate relationships – be it casual or romantic, it's your choice.

Revenge is a dish that is best served cold.
The last Godfather was killed in cold blood, and only you are qualified to take over as the head of the Mafia. The entire business operation of the crime syndicate is falling apart, and rioters are trying to steal your turf and businesses. In the centre of this chaos, It is up to you to restore order and show them who's the real boss of the city!

What you can expect: seamless infinite zoom, turn-based combat raids, in-game global chat systems, interactive date simulation with exciting romance storylines, gang recruitment, nightclub management, PvP turf wars and many more!

Compete for hegemony in cross-server PVP gang battles, take part in alliance wars or complete bounty tasks for the Mafia to become the king of kings.
Wealth is not the only goal; it's so much more than that — it's all about Power and Fame.

Game Features:
[MAKE your CHOICE]
As the head of the crime family, your actions will determine your fate in the game as you face extraordinary challenges and dangerous situations in your journey to become the most powerful mafia family ever. How the game progresses is entirely up to you and the choices you make.

[MEET your BABE/BEAUTY/ANGEL/HOTTIE]
Brains, Brawns and Beauty, these babes' got it all.
There are countless opportunities to meet the girl of your dreams in this game. Take your dream girl out on dates, gift her items and complete mini-games to enhance intimacy between them.

[BUILD your EMPIRE]
Your facilities are vital to achieving your goals to claim your reign as the ultimate king of the crime syndicates. Be strategic when it comes to building and upgrading your facilities. Harness the potential of your city by upgrading the technology tree whenever possible.

[SELECT your CREW]
You'll need all the help you can get.
Head down to the Nightclub to recruit Capos to help you manage the gang members. There are a total of 6 Different Roles: Hitman, Gunman, Bodyguard, Biker and the All Rounder. Each Capo is equipped with a unique skill set, and it is crucial to assign the best Capo for different jobs.

[CRUSH your ENEMIES]
Conquer and control neighbouring hoods.
Prevent rival mobs from taking over your territories. Operate your gang and plan your defences. Optimize and strategize your resources to control the city and prosper to expand your reach in the gangland.

[PLEDGE your ALLEGIANCE]
Join an alliance with other zealous mobsters from all over the world with mutual goals. Deepen your bonds by helping other alliance members in their tasks. Draw resources from the alliance, be it protection or backup. Plan your tactics and strategies to bring your alliance to the top.
